מילים כדורבנות!  כך צריך לדבר מנהיג אמיתי, וזה כדי שלא יהיה ספק בעובדות הקיימות! אולי יאהבו אותנו קצת פחות, אבל יבינו שאנחנו קיימים ויש לנו מטרה.  מדינת ישראל חיה וקיימת לעולם ועד!

תיהיה חזק אל תתן לאפחד לשנות את הדעות שלך ישראל שלנו ולא ניתן אותה לאפחד
סוף סוף יש מנהיג למדינה הזאת
ביבי שהשם יברך אותך
גם אי אפשר להיתכחש לזה שאובמה הוא אנטישימי ממדרגה ראשונה הוא רוצה להפיל עלינו את כל העבר המוסלמי שלו זו בעיה שלו לא שלנו שייתן לנו לחיות בשקט במדינת היהודים
אנחנו במלחמת קיום על עתידנו כולם צריכים להיתאחד אל מול אובמה האנטישמי ממדרגה ראשונה לא היה כדוגמתו מאז קום המדינה שלנו תתפקחו ותנו כוח לראש הממשלה להיתגבר עליו
הוא מתייחס אלינו כאילו אנחנו חיים כאן בטעות נותן לגיטימציה לעם הפלסטיני והמוסלמי להיתאחד נגדנו בלי פשרות הוא עוד עלול להביא עלינו חורבן בהתנהגות שלו כלפינו

ביבי - עם ישראל מאחוריך ....עמוד בלחצים המגיעים מחוסין או-במבה ...ממשלת ימין בראשותך היא - הדרך האמיתית לקביעת עמדות מדיניות בנושא השלום עם הפלסטינים ...לך רה''מ יש את כל האפשרויות להחליט ומתוקף תפקידך המורם ....המצב הפוליטי הקיים בישראל הוא ...שכרגע עומדת ממשלת - ימין , ודרכה של ממשלה זו היא אך ורק דרך הימין בלי לסטות חלילה [ כי אחרת תצטרך להחזיר את המנדט שקיבלת בבחירות] ...וחוסין הוא זה שצריך להתגמש בדרישותיו מישראל ...ביבי - חזק ואמץ ...אתה הפה הדמוקרטי של עם ישראל ..

"We will never forget that their sacrifice was not in vain. data.message: It's nice to commemorate those who deserve it! :)
איפה ישנם עוד אנשים כמו האיש ההוא

DREW:

About exactly which "countrymen" are you speaking?

As for "suggesting the Palestinians had a valid grievance against your nation" you sound like the typical self-hating "partially-Jewish" left winger . . . I don't know the circumstances of the threat to beat you but perhaps that fellow had a point -- " You want to think about that, sir."

Drew...what is your country that has lost its wealth, peace and hope? You are not referring to the US are you? And on behalf of the Jewish people I want to thank you for not holding a grudge.    Aren't you being just as short sighted about Israel or don't you think 60 years of wars, attacks on settlements and schools and eight years of Kassam rockets on Sderot would be a good foundation for complaints against those that do not even acknowledge the existence of Israel

No they didn't Drew,  number one the Israeli's didn't even posses the land until 1948, and it was a desolate area of land with an extremely low population of people. Hardly had an Army built up to be able to kick people out, an absurd charge you are claiming.  The neighboring Arab people's kicked many out of their vast amounts of lands once they got control of their lands from the old Ottoman Empire.

 The Israelis welcomed all and many persecuted Jews found refuge there but also many other peoples were welcomed and allowed to prosper.  You are very ignorant of the facts. 

There is a G-d of Israel and His Will  is done, He does not sleep nor slumber keeping His Land.  No matter what lies you try to propagate Drew your will not destroy Israel nor take Her land from Her People
Drew should go pull a Rachel Corrie.

Drew; Judging from your comments and your picture you are just a mixed up, rebellious little kid without any real world experience who was raised in an overly permissive upper middle class family that coddled you way too much and disciplined and educated you way too little - your posh high school notwithstanding.

I'm not going to argue with you -- both your world view and your knowledge of historical fact are too sorely lacking in both logic and fact to make that worthwhile.

Your threat, "I will leave them crippled and unable to talk" is just childish schoolyard taunting and boasting. When I was in the U.S. Army we had a saying for your sort of empty threats: Don't let your alligator mouth overload your hummingbird ass.

Just for the record, I am a dual citizen - Israeli and American - and I am Dr. Berg.

Joy, you are exactly right! Be Blessed! <3

Drew asked, "So it's okay that one of your fellow Americans was threatened for speaking his mind?"
But, he asked it right after making his own threat:
"If he or anybody else threatens me with physical violence on Israel's behalf again, I will leave them crippled and unable to talk!"

The hypocrisy of hate!  [sigh]

Bottom line, Israel and the Jews are God's chosen people.
You can rant and rave all you like, but it doesn't change a thing.  Israel will stand because God is with them.  
Why don't you try arguing with God Drew?  Good luck with that.

DREW...YOU CAN'T CATCH THE WIND...BUT GOD CAN BREATHE SOMETHING ON YOU ALOT MORE HURTFUL THAN A THREAT...BUT...HE WOULD RATHER YOU HONOR HIM BY HONORING HIS COVENANTS AND PROMISES MADE TO THE JEWISH PEOPLE AND THE LAND HE GAVE THEM. HE WOULD RATHER YOU STOP BEING SO ARROGANT THAT  YOU THINK ANY MAN OWNS WHAT GOD CREATED OR DID NOT GIVE TO HIM. HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF PROOFS PEOPLE OF THE BIBLE ARE BACK IN THEIR LAND GOD GAVE TO THEM.

Deuteronomy 4:37-42 (New King James Version)
37 And because He loved your fathers, therefore He chose their descendants after them; and He brought you out of Egypt with His Presence, with His mighty power, 38 driving out from before you nations greater and mightier than you, to bring you in, to give you their land as an inheritance, as it is this day. 39 Therefore know this day, and consider it in your heart, that the LORD Himself is God in heaven above and on the earth beneath; there is no other. 40 You shall therefore keep His statutes and His commandments which I command you today, that it may go well with you and with your children after you, and that you may prolong your days in the land which the LORD your God is giving you for all time.”
Drew check your history...not the arab propaganda...stop believing their lies!
God BLESS Benjamin Netanyahu
Yes, GOD BLESS him! Keep it up Bibi, you are great we need more like you!!!!

data.caption: en.netanyahu.org.il
data.message: Each of us is forced to decide if we take a stand on things that matter in our lives and matter to the lives of those we hold dear. And Natan Sharansky took one of the greatest personal stands in the post-war period and the day you stood up in a Soviet court, tore up your indictment and said ‘Next year in Jerusalem’ was a testament, not only to your character, but what you represent in the modern history of our people. And I’ve found it a personal privilege to have had the opportunity to take part in the broad efforts to get Natan out of that large jail, to bring him home and to have an enduring partnership and friendship since. And I also appreciate the fact that you were kind enough to give me a draw in a game of chess that we played. I know you were kind because to others you are unforgiving so I appreciate that very much. I’ve never played with him since and I don’t intend to.
